text: Standing Together is an album by Midnight Star. It was released in 1981 on the SOLAR Records label. ==Track listing== #"Standing Together" 5:00 #"Tuff " 5:05 #"Can't Give You Up" 4:13 #"Hold Out" 4:58 #"I've Been Watching You" 6:00 #"I Won't Let You Be Lonely" 4:05 #"I Got What You Need" 4:38 #"Open Up To Love" 4:38 ==Chart positions== ===Album=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !
